Class: SessionManager

SessionManager

This is an INTERNAL session manager unrelated to session validation, and is present only for reference purposes. We use it for testing the session validator only. The class you're likely looking for is SessionValidator.

We're only simulating sessions here, so this is just a hack to get the job done. The count down of the session may not be accurate, and one single session is shared through the entire application. i.e. For testing only.

Constructor

new SessionManager()

Source:
  • app/session_manager.js, line 17

Methods

(static) sessionCounter()

The sessionCounter is used with setTimeout() to repeatedly decrement the session time. Ideally, we'd look at the start time of the session time.
Source:
  • app/session_manager.js, line 34

expireSession()

expireSession() expires the session and requests termination of sessionCounter().
Source:
  • app/session_manager.js, line 69

startSession()

startSession() starts the 1 second calls of sessionCounter().
